issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The title and timestamp for one of the twitter posts, shown in the tableview, are getting truncated in Kitchen Sink.

Not a Regression. This also occurs on 2.0.2

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Kitchen Sink Application
2. Go to MashUp -> Twitter
3. Check the twitter posts

Actual: One of the twitter posts have truncated title and timestamp. (Refer to attached screenshot)

Expected: All the rows in the tableview should be of consistent height and show data completely
fields.summary: Android: Twitter: Title and timestamp for a twitter post shown truncated in the tableview
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0.201206172244
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120619164153
Android Device: Android Tab (V3.2), Galaxy Nexus (V4.0.2)
Runtime: v8

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
